QueryList.Query: FROM UserInfo A WHERE 1=1 <#if id??> <#if like??> and A.id=%:id% #else> and A.id=:id </#if> </#if> <#if authority??> <#if like??> and A.authority=%:authority% #else> and A.authority=:authority </#if> </#if> <#if status??> <#if like??> and A.status=%:status% #else> and A.status=:status </#if> </#if> <#if openid??> <#if like??> and A.openid=%:openid% #else> and A.openid=:openid </#if> </#if> <#if reallyName??> <#if like??> and A.reallyName=%:reallyName% #else> and A.reallyName=:reallyName </#if> </#if> <#if idCard??> <#if like??> and A.idCard=%:idCard% #else> and A.idCard=:idCard </#if> </#if> <#if idCardImage??> <#if like??> and A.idCardImage=%:idCardImage% #else> and A.idCardImage=:idCardImage </#if> </#if>
